scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:files
scripts.copy:files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('public')){fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true})}; const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true})}; fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(item=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,item); const destPath=path.join(dest,item); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath)}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})}; fs.readdirSync('.').forEach(item=>{if(item.endsWith('.html')){fs.copyFileSync(item,path.join('public',item))}}); copyDir('assets',path.join('public','assets')); copyDir('css',path.join('public','css')); copyDir('js',path.join('public','js')); copyDir('dist',path.join('public','dist')); ['robots.txt','sitemap.xml'].forEach(file=>{if(fs.existsSync(file)){fs.copyFileSync(file,path.join('public',file))}});"
